line.text: %PLAYER%: All this was created by the Cerci in just a few days? These tunnels must stretch for miles!
%PLAYER%: Whoever created these creatures for Apocalypse is a master geneticist. They must reach full maturity in a matter of hours.
%PLAYER%: The Cerci haven't wasted any time taking over Genosha. Look at these tunnels, they go on forever!
line.textb: %PLAYER%: The Cerci haven't wasted any time taking over Genosha. Look at these tunnels, they go on forever!

line.text: %PLAYER%: Whoever created these creatures for Apocalypse is a master geneticist. They must reach full maturity in a matter of hours.
